title: Cricket: Technique #450 Thermal Brush 3 1/4"

Heat resistant static free bristles eliminate fly away hair and utilize antimicrobial protection against bacteria growth. Hair sectioning pick conveniently stores in the base of suede-like grip. With this brush you have it all at your fingertips.
